## GrpcServer.extractRelevantConfig() method

**Signature:**

```typescript
protected extractRelevantConfig(config: GrpcServerOptions): {
        hostname: string;
        port: number;
        protocol: import("./base").KoattyProtocol;
        sslEnabled: boolean;
        connectionPool: {
            maxConnections: number;
            keepAliveTime: number;
            keepAliveTimeout: number;
        };
    };
```
